headline: Governments Expand Restrictions on Travel to China as Cases Spike
abstract: With cases spiking in China and early signs of a spread outside Asia, Hong Kong severely cut back transportation to the mainland.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG â€” Countries, cities and businesses across the globe issued new travel warnings on Tuesday, vastly expanding a cordon intended to control the flow of people to and from China, where the authorities are struggling to contain the outbreak of the new coronavirus.
keywords: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
